sqlMap.select: SELECT province_id AS provinceId, province AS provinceName FROM ms_province ORDER BY province_id
SELECT c.city_id AS cityId, c.city AS cityName, p.province AS cityProvinceName FROM ms_city c join ms_province p on p.province_id = c.province_id ORDER BY c.city_id
SELECT major_id AS majorId, major AS majorName, description AS description FROM ms_major ORDER BY major_id
SELECT department_id AS departmentId, department AS msDepartmentName, description AS description FROM ms_department ORDER BY department_id
SELECT location_id AS locationId, location AS locationName, description AS description FROM ms_location ORDER BY location_id
SELECT privilege_id AS privilegeId, privilege AS privilegeName, description AS description FROM ms_privilege ORDER BY privilege_id
SELECT position_id AS positionId, position AS positionName FROM ms_position ORDER BY position_id
SELECT bank_id AS bankId, bank AS bankName, description AS description FROM ms_bank ORDER BY bank_id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MS_PROVINCE( province_id, province, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_PROVINCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #provinceName#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )
INSERT INTO MS_CITY( city_id, city, province_id, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_CITY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #cityName#, #cityProvinceId#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )
INSERT INTO MS_MAJOR( major_id, major, description, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_MAJOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #majorName#, #description#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )

INSERT INTO MS_DEPARTMENT( department_id, department, description, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_DEPARTMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #msDepartmentName#, #description#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )
INSERT INTO MS_LOCATION( location_id, location, description, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_LOCATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #locationName#, #description#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )

INSERT INTO MS_PRIVILEGE( privilege_id, privilege, description, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_PRIVILEGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #privilegeName#, #description#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )
INSERT INTO MS_POSITION( position_id, position, description, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_POSITION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #positionName#, #description#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )
INSERT INTO MS_BANK( bank_id, bank, description, created_by, create_date, updated_by, update_date ) VALUES( MS_BANK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #bankName#, #description#, '', SYSDATE, '', '' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ms_user SET password = GET_HASH(#newPass#) WHERE username = #userName#
UPDATE ms_province SET province = #provinceName# WHERE province_id = #id#
